WorkItem.ClosedComment: Umm, that is NOT what that trinket says... at allThe line says "10x 27 Stamina (10 Sec 60% DamageTakenPhysical)" and that means"A 60% chance on taking Physical Damage that you will proc a stack of 27 Bonus Stamina, stacking up to 10 times. The Proc lasts 10 seconds if not refreshed."This is how that information is displayed.
WorkItem.Description: Using the Bear module, armor value on trinkets is not working properly, it says silly things like 60% physical dmg reduction for a proc that isnt even armor (Petrified Twilight Scale, Unidentifiable Organ)?

Comments.Message: Not sure where you're getting the "60% physical dmg reduction" thing, but yes, it is saying that those trinkets are very highly rated, and that is accurate; they are incredibly good.
"60% physical dmg reduction" is the proc of Unidentifiable Organ (10*27 stam?!) Dont know whats that
